articles.author: Luke Ramseth
articles.title: Detroit Three struggle in reliability ranking, but two brands are up - The Detroit News
articles.description: Consumer Reports released its annual reliability and other rankings, which shows Asian brands leading the way.
articles.content: Detroit Three automakers again struggled compared to their Asian competition in Consumer Reports' annual brand reliability rankings, though Buick and Ford both notably made up ground on the leaders.… [+255 chars]
